wikipedia_page.main: Terence Soall (22 March 1920 – 10 August 2006) was an English actor who appeared in numerous television productions over a 50-year period and in over 100 films.

link_mentions.page: List of The Avengers and The New Avengers cast members

response: It starred Margot Boyd, James Clifton, Aimée Delamain, Vincent Goodman and Terence Soall.
